column4: No, the Preinstallation I men, that make one PC, ahd do the own configuration on it, and than make the disk, whith wich I cold install aal the same as it was on my configured system, without the reconfiguring...
It is as on IBM notebooks is eaven one partition for making the preinstallation disks
I wouldn't call that "preinstallation", sounds like you just want to copy your settings to another PC..
How to accomplish that... Er.... I'm not certain.
